#summary Howto change your keyboard layout
#labels Featured

*Since 6.0rc-4, this can be done through Settings->Language & Input->Device Keyboard->Keyboard Layout.*

= If your layout is not available =
  Please copy the /system/usr/keylayout/eve_qwerty.kl from an official rom in your language. Then please fill an issue and attach this file, so we can make it available to everyone
